articles.description: U.S. live cattle futures closed higher on Friday on bargain buying after the benchmark April contract fell to a 4-1/2-month low this week, with traders citing expectations for a seasonal pickup in beef demand, traders said.'
articles.content:
CHICAGO, Feb 14 (Reuters) - U.S. live cattle futures closed higher on Friday on bargain buying after the benchmark April contract fell to a 4-1/2-month low this week, with traders citing expectations for a seasonal pickup in beef demand, traders said.

articles.author: Harshith Aranya
articles.title: Asia gold: China premiums near 1-1/2 year lows as virus saps demand
